title: The Institute for Functional Medicine's Elimination Diet Comprehensive Guide and Food Plan
author: Experience Life Staff
description: Get a free download of The Institute for Functional Medicine's Elimination Diet Comprehensive Guide!
cleaned_text: The Institute for Functional Medicine is pleased to provide Experience Life readers with access to IFM's proprietary Elimination Diet Comprehensive Guide and Food Plan. Here's how to keep this overachieving organ in optimal shape.
